workflow.name: Translate PDFs into multiple languages with Google Translate & ConvertAPI cost tracking
workflow.description:
# Description

This n8n template automates PDF translation into 1 or 2 target languages while maintaining professional formatting. Users submit PDFs via web form and receive translated documents via email with preserved headings, paragraphs, and bullet points.

## Use Cases

‚Ä¢	International Business Contracts
‚Ä¢	Multilingual Product Documentation
‚Ä¢	Educational Content Distribution
‚Ä¢ Healthcare Patient Information for Diverse    patient population
‚Ä¢ Marketing Campaign Materials

## What it does


‚Ä¢	Accepts PDF uploads via web form
‚Ä¢	Extracts and converts text to structured HTML
‚Ä¢	Translates using Google Translate API (20+ languages including Hindi, Telugu, Spanish,   
         French, German, Chinese)
‚Ä¢	Converts to professional PDFs with ConvertAPI
‚Ä¢	Emails translated PDFs with cost breakdown
‚Ä¢	Tracks expenses in data table for analytics

## Set up

‚Ä¢	Configure Google Cloud Service Account (Translation API enabled)
‚Ä¢	Add ConvertAPI Query Auth credentials
‚Ä¢	Set up Gmail OAuth2 with send permissions
‚Ä¢	Create n8n Data Table named cost_tracking
‚Ä¢	Activate workflow and access form via webhook URL

## Requirements

‚Ä¢	Google Cloud account with Translation API
‚Ä¢	ConvertAPI account with credits
‚Ä¢	Gmail account for delivery
‚Ä¢	PDF files with selectable text (not scanned images)


## Customize

‚Ä¢ Edit CSS in "Prepare HTML" nodes for PDF styling
‚Ä¢	Update pricing in "Cost ‚Äì Build record" node
‚Ä¢	Add languages in "Process Form Data" and form dropdown
‚Ä¢	Modify email template in Gmail nodes

## Support: 

Join n8n Discord or Community Forum

workflow.name: Translate English PDFs to Any 2 Languages with Cost Tracking via Google Translate & ConvertAPI

nodes.name: Convert to HTML
nodes.notes: Converts extracted PDF text to properly formatted HTML with CSS styling

nodes.name: Translate to Language 1
nodes.notes:
Translates HTML content preserving all tags and structure

NOTE: CONNECT GOOGLE SERVICE ACCOUNT CREDENTIAL IN N8N (TRANSLATION API ENABLED).

nodes.name: Translate to Language 2
nodes.notes:
Translates HTML content preserving all tags and structure

NOTE: CONNECT GOOGLE SERVICE ACCOUNT CREDENTIAL IN N8N (TRANSLATION API ENABLED).

nodes.name: Prepare HTML 1
nodes.notes: Prepares HTML as binary for PDF conversion

nodes.name: Prepare HTML 2
nodes.notes: Prepares HTML as binary for PDF conversion

nodes.name: Convert HTML to PDF 1
nodes.notes:
Converts HTML to PDF using ConvertAPI with proper margins

NOTE: ADD ConvertAPI SECRET (QUERY PARAM "Secret" OR N8N CREDENTIAL).

nodes.name: Convert HTML to PDF 2
nodes.notes:
Converts HTML to PDF using ConvertAPI with proper margins

NOTE: ADD ConvertAPI SECRET (QUERY PARAM "Secret" OR N8N CREDENTIAL).

nodes.name: Send Email (2 PDFs)
nodes.notes: NOTE: CONNECT GMAIL OAUTH2 (SEND) CREDENTIAL IN N8N.

nodes.name: Send Email(1 PDF)
nodes.notes: NOTE: CONNECT GMAIL OAUTH2 (SEND) CREDENTIAL IN N8N.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
